nodes.text: The X'us'R'iia was the name given to the desert storms on the planet Jakku. Named after the god R'iia, Teedos believed the X'us'R'iia was R'iia's breath, which punished their sins. The storms could last for days and were marked by deafening winds, thunder, and dry lightning.
The X'us'R'iia first appeared in Before the Awakening, a junior novel written by Greg Rucka and published in 2015.
